page.title: 17 Biography
page.content: Mrs. Bennett is a councillor for our area and also a governor of our school, Delaval Primary. She was born at West Moor and lives nearby. She says she enjoyed school, especially running. She has lived in Forest Hall for over 40 years and has seen lots of changes take place, particularly the increase in population and the growth of Killingworth. As a councillor Mrs. Bennett enjoys working for the local community. Two years ago she was lady mayoress of North Tyneside. Mrs. Bennett has been a governor of our school for a number of years, and follows in the footsteps of her mother who was also a governor here. Like all good "Geordies", Mrs Bennett supports Newcastle United Football Club.
